description: Root and seal strength scoring criteria based on SKY_LIZARD fortune app standards
source: SKY_LIZARD Fortune App v10.4 - sipsin table analysis

ten_gods_scoring.description: Base scoring weights for Ten Gods relationships

root_seal_weights.description: Multipliers for root and seal calculations

strength_thresholds.description: Thresholds for determining daymaster strength levels

seasonal_adjustments.description: Seasonal state multipliers based on Wang state

calculation_formula.description: Standard formula for root/seal strength calculation
steps: 2. Apply ten_gods_scoring weights based on daymaster relationship
3. Apply root_seal_weights based on position (month vs other)
5. Apply seasonal_adjustments based on Wang state
6. Sum total score and determine strength level
